content.rendered:
6 Days Master Course by ZS

6 Different Looks

Certificate in End

Professional Photography

Personalized Guidance

After Course Support

1 -To-1 Interaction

Course FAQs

What topics will the 6-day master course by ZS cover?

ZS's master course dives into advanced makeup techniques, product selection, client consultations, and industry secrets, providing a comprehensive understanding of professional makeup artistry.

How long is each session in the 6-day master course?

Each session in the 6-day course lasts for approximately 4 hours, inclusive of demonstrations, practice time, and Q&A with ZS.

Will there be hands-on practice during the course?

Absolutely! ZS believes in practical learning. Participants will have hands-on practice sessions to apply techniques taught, ensuring skill enhancement.

Are any materials or kits provided as part of the course?

Yes, participants will receive a curated makeup kit with essential products handpicked by ZS to aid in the learning process.
